title: VOTE: Who should Tottenham sign in January transfer window?
description: Will Tottenham make any moves in the January transfer window? If so, who will they sign?
content: Spurs are involved in a tight battle for a top-four place in the Premier League and also face Juventus in the last 16 of the Champions League.But will they make any big moves this month?Our interactive tool allows you to share your views on the latest transfer talk. The players below have all been linked with Tottenham in the media recently, but would YOU like to see the rumours become a reality?Swipe right if you would like to see the player join Tottenham. Swipe left if you would not (app users need to hold down the image before swiping or use the vote buttons below).Sky Sports have reported that both Fulham's Ryan Sessegnon and Manchester United's Luke Shaw are targets for Spurs.And Spurs have also been scouting for a long-term replacement for Mousa Dembele. They have looked at Geoffrey Kondogbia, Matteo Guendouzi, Yves Bissouma and Frenkie de Jong.Italian outlets Transfermarketweb and Calciomercato say Spurs are interested in Borussia Monchengladbach defender Jannik Vestergaard and Fiorentina's Giovanni Simeone respectively.Bordeaux's Malcom has emerged as a target while the Daily Express have reported interest in Barcelona midfielder Andre Gomes.Head here to follow all the latest transfer news with our dedicated Transfer Centre blog.
